res=$(CocoaDialog inputbox --title "Encrypt Text With AES 128" --informative-text "What password should be used?" --text "s3cr37" --button1 "Encrypt" --button2 "Cancel")
[[ $(head -n1 <<<"$res") == "2" ]] && exit_discard passwd=$(tail -n1 <<<"$res")
openssl enc -e -aes128 -base64 -pass "pass:$passwd"
